custom_features.name: available
custom_features.description:
monday to friday , 
Saturday and monday vacation

prompts.categorize: Categorize this customer query into one of: Information, Support, Issues, General. Consider the context from the business description. Query: {query}
prompts.sentiment: Analyze the sentiment of this query as positive, negative, or neutral. Query: {query}
prompts.handle_information: Provide a {tone} response with information based on the business context. Use the business description to provide accurate details. Query: {query}
prompts.handle_support: Provide a {tone} support response addressing the customer's needs. Query: {query}
prompts.handle_issues: Provide a {tone} response addressing any issues or problems. Query: {query}
prompts.general: Provide a {tone} response to this general query based on the business context. Query: {query}
prompts.escalate: I understand this requires special attention. A support representative will contact you shortly.

custom_requirements: Ask first user prompt and give the answer
